      • payPrice

        public void payPrice​(Ammo yourAmmo,
                     Ammo whichAmmo,
                     PowerUpCard powerUpCard)
        Parameters:
        yourAmmo - the total ammos of the player
        whichAmmo - an Ammo object in which only one of the color should value 1, represents the ammo you want to pay with
        powerUpCard - if you want to pay with a powerUp, in this case whichAmmo can be null

      • activate

        public void activate()
        Description copied from class: EffectCard
        Activates the card and make it usable. a Player should already have been set at this point
        Specified by:
        activate in class EffectCard

      • playNextAction

        public Action playNextAction()
        activates the next action inside the effect. Must be called for the first action too. It also cancels the active effect and action if there are no more actions. In this case, on the last call it returned null
        Specified by:
        playNextAction in class EffectCard
        Returns:
        the action that has just been activated, or null if there are no more actions
        Throws:
        WeaponCardException - if the card has not been activated
